cryptographyBasics

Class OTReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • cryptographyBasics.OTReceiver

  • public class OTReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    yoanmartin Class representing the client who asks for data from an id. See page 8 from the reference document

      • generateAiBi

        public java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> generateAiBi(java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> eArray,
                                                java.math.BigInteger k)
        Generate the final data from all the values received from the server
        Parameters:
        eArray - The byte array containing values encrypted by the server
        k - K signed by the server and unblinded by the client
        Returns:
        The final data computed by the client using every data received from the server
